results.title: Effects of metformin on the prevention of bisphosphonate-related osteonecrosis of the jaw-like lesions in rats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @DISEASE_Tooth_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014076 @@@Tooth extraction@@@ with long-term @CHEMICAL_Zoledronic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077211 @@@ZA@@@ and DX administration inhibited bone remodeling and induced @CHEMICAL_Diphosphonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004164 @@@bisphosphonate@@@-related @DISEASE_Jaw_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007571 @@@osteonecrosis of the jaw-like lesions@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ exerted protective effects ag ainst @<m>DISEASE_Bisphosphonate_Associated_Osteonecrosis_of_the_Jaw</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059266 @@@osteonecrosis of the jaw@@@.

citations.NLM: Nakagawa T, Tsuka S, Aonuma F, Nodai T, Munemasa T, Tamura A, Mukaibo T, Kondo Y, Masaki C, Hosokawa R. Effects of metformin on the prevention of bisphosphonate-related osteonecrosis of the jaw-like lesions in rats. J Prosthodont Res. 2021 Jun 30;65(2):219-224. PMID: 32938854
